page.title: 03A SCHOOL DAY AT WIDEWELL
page.content: School starts at 9am when the whistle goes and we're called in to our classes and we have the register.Then we go down to assembly.When we come back after about 20 minutes we do Maths or English till playtime at 10.35 till 10.55.When we come in sometimes we do P.E. sometimes we have a T.V. programme and sometimes we just do Maths or English till 11.55 when we pack up to go out to play at 12pm.We are called in for lunch at 12.30.Then we play till 1.15.In the afternoon we sometimes do project work sometimes we do science and sometimes we do art.If it is a Thursday then we work till 2.15 when we have P.E.But if it is not a Thursday we work till 2.45 when we have playtime.After play we have a story till 3.30 when we go home.
